menu.name: Bunny Chow
menu.description: A popular South African dish consisting of a hollowed-out loaf of bread filled with curry. It's a spicy and hearty meal with a unique presentation.

menu.name: Boerewors Roll
menu.description: A traditional South African sausage made from beef, lamb, and spices, served in a roll. It's flavorful and often enjoyed at braais (barbecues).

menu.name: Bobotie
menu.description: A South African dish made from minced meat, spices, and dried fruit, topped with a custard-like mixture and baked until golden. It's a comforting and aromatic meal.

menu.name: Chakalaka & Pap
menu.description: Chakalaka is a spicy vegetable relish, while Pap is a staple maize porridge. This combination is a classic South African dish that's both flavorful and filling.

menu.name: Malva Pudding
menu.description: A sweet, sticky, and spongy dessert made with apricot jam and served with a rich cream sauce. It's a beloved South African treat that's indulgent and delicious.

menu.name: Cape Malay Curry
menu.description: A flavorful curry with a blend of aromatic spices, commonly made with chicken or lamb. It's influenced by Cape Malay cuisine and offers a balance of sweet and spicy flavors.

menu.name: Milk Tart
menu.description: A traditional South African dessert with a creamy custard filling in a pastry crust. It's lightly spiced with cinnamon and offers a smooth, sweet flavor.

menu.name: Vetkoek
menu.description: Deep-fried bread dough that's crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. Often served with savory fillings or as a side dish with curry or stew.

menu.name: Braai Meat Platter
menu.description: A platter featuring a variety of grilled meats typically served at a South African braai. It includes cuts such as steak, sausage, and lamb chops, often accompanied by side dishes.

menu.name: Koeksisters
menu.description: A sweet, sticky treat made from braided dough that's deep-fried and then soaked in syrup. It's a popular South African confection with a crispy exterior and a sweet, gooey center.
